parameters.name: AcceptLanguage
parameters.description:
The language of the response. Valid values:

*   zh: Chinese
*   en: English

parameters.name: Mute
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to disable the notification feature if the risk item occurs.

*   true: disabled
*   false: enabled

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The region in which the cluster resides.

parameters.name: RequestPars
parameters.description: The extended request parameters in the JSON format.

parameters.name: RiskCode
parameters.description: The ID of the risk item.
